markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Engine Bay](/Feats.aspx?ID=3148) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 56</row>

**Archetype** [Vehicle Mechanic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=113)

**Prerequisites**
[Vehicle Mechanic Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3147); Expert in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)

</column>

---

You are practiced at working in vast garages of [vehicles](/equipment/vehicles) and can work on many machines at a time. When [Repairing](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) and spending the full 10 minutes, you can fix up to two objects. If you are a master in Crafting, you can fix up to four targets. If you're legendary in Crafting, you can fix up to eight targets. This feat has no effect when using [Quick Repair](/Feats.aspx?ID=827) or another ability to reduce the time spent Repairing.
name: Engine Bay
prerequisite: Vehicle Mechanic Dedication; Expert in Crafting
